dialogue.introduction: It's me, Urakaze, nice to meet 'ya!
dialogue.library_intro: Osaka-born, attached to Kure. I saw action from Pearl Harbor to Guadalcanal. My last moments were escorting Kongou nee-san at the Taiwan Strait. Anyway, there's nothing that can be done anymore...
dialogue.secretary2: Admiral-san, you're lookin' energetic today as well.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Mmmmm, I'd like to go out soon.
dialogue.wedding: Whenever I see Admiral doing his best all day long, somehow I just can't leave you alone... yeah! Don't be too reckless, alright!
dialogue.show_players_score: Admiral-san? It's be good to read it soon.
dialogue.equipment1: As long as I'm strong, I would be able to protect everyone!
dialogue.equipment2: Hey, did I get a bit cooler?
dialogue.ship_construction: There's a new ship brought in.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: There's a fleet that just completed it's mission.
dialogue.mvp: There's no need to worry. Because I'm here this fleet is safe!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: My turrets are broke, and I'm all battered...
dialogue.sunk: Don't worry 'bout me, it's better... to do a speedy withdrawal... from here...
dialogue.new_year_2015: Admiral, it's the new year. I'll be counting on you this year too!
dialogue.christmas_2015: It's Christmas.I also made various food please see for yourself.How's the taste?
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: It's already December. I've already finished with cleaning, so I should prepare the New Year's Food... Ah, yeah, leave it to me!♪ What is it, Isokaze? Yeah, I'll help you.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Admiral? Why are you throwing beans at me? I won't get angry, so tell me. Hmm? Hmmm--?
